docs.title: Welcome to Understanding Dementia
docs.text: A textbook about dementia and cognitive decline

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: This intelligent textbook is built with MkDocs Material theme.

docs.title: Navigation
docs.text: Use the navigation menu on the left to explore chapters and content.

docs.title: About
docs.text: This textbook provides comprehensive coverage of dementia and cognitive decline.

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: The goal of this intelligent textbook is to provide accessible, interactive learning resources about dementia for students, healthcare professionals, and caregivers.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Interactive MicroSims for hands-on learning
  • Comprehensive learning graph showing concept dependencies
  • Glossary of key terms
  • Frequently asked questions
  • References to authoritative sources

docs.title: Get in Touch
docs.text: For questions, feedback, or suggestions about this textbook, please use the following channels:

docs.title: GitHub
docs.text: Visit the GitHub repository to: - Report issues - Suggest improvements - Contribute content

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: This section can be updated with additional contact methods as needed.

docs.title: Understanding Dementia
docs.text: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to dementia and cognitive decline.

docs.title: Target Audience
docs.text: This textbook is designed for: - Healthcare professionals - Medical students - Caregivers - General learners interested in understanding dementia

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text: No specific prerequisites are required. Basic knowledge of human biology is helpful but not necessary.

docs.title: Learning Objectives
docs.text: By the end of this course, learners will be able to: - Understand the different types of dementia - Recognize the signs and symptoms of cognitive decline - Learn about diagnosis and treatment options - Understand caregiving strategies and support resources

docs.title: General Questions
docs.text: This section will be populated with common questions as the textbook content is developed.

docs.title: Navigation
docs.text:
Use the left sidebar to navigate between different sections of the textbook:

  • Chapters: Main content organized by topic
  • MicroSims: Interactive simulations and visualizations
  • Learning Graph: Visual representation of concept dependencies
  • Glossary: Definitions of key terms
  • FAQ: Frequently asked questions

docs.title: Search
docs.text: Use the search bar at the top to find specific topics or terms.

docs.title: Code Blocks
docs.text: Code examples include a copy button for easy copying.

docs.title: Interactive Elements
docs.text: Look for interactive MicroSims embedded throughout the chapters for hands-on learning.

docs.title: Math Support
docs.text: Mathematical expressions are rendered using MathJax. Inline math is denoted with $...$ and block math with $$...$$.

docs.title: Getting Help
docs.text: If you have questions or need support, please refer to the FAQ section or use the contact information provided.

docs.title: Glossary
docs.text: This glossary contains definitions of key terms used throughout the textbook.
